content: परिसंख्या {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To count or reckon up, add together. {@--2@} To enumerate.

परिसंख्या {@--1@} Enumeration, computation. {@--2@} Sum, total, number; वित्तस्य विद्यापरिसंख्यया मे <ls>R. 5. 21.</ls> {@--3@} (In <ls>Mīm.</ls> <ab>phil.</ab>) Exclusion, specification, limitation to that which is enumerated or expressly mentioned, so that everything else is excluded; (परिसंख्या is opposed to विधि which lays down a rule for the first time, and to नियम which restricts the choice to an alternative which is expressly stated when several such alternatives are possible); विधिरत्यंतमप्राप्तौ नियमः पाक्षिके सति . तत्र चान्यत्र च प्राप्तौ परिसंख्येति गीयते .. {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} पंच पंचनखा भक्ष्याः usually quoted by the Mīmāṃsakas; अयं नियमविधिर्न तु परिसंख्या <ls>Kull.</ls> on <ls>Ms. 3. 45.</ls> {@--4@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) Special mention or exclusive specification, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} where with or without a query something is affirmed for the denial, expressed or understood, of something else similar to it; (this figure is particularly striking when it is based on a श्लेष or pun); यस्मिन् महीं शासति चित्रकर्मसु वर्णसंकराश्चापेषु गुणच्छेदाः &c. or यस्य नूपुरेषु मुखरता विवाहेषु करग्रहणं तुरंगेषु कशाभिघातः &c. K; for other examples see <ls>S. D. 735.</ls> {@--5@} Recapitueation.
